activities: We are an association of independent accounting firms worldwide. We have member firms throughout the world, including the EU. Our website can be used as a search tool for companies in need of accounting services - they can search for member firms and/or individuals based on name, location, industry and/or practice area. Individuals also contact us through our website, at which times they may provide us personal information in order to respond to and address their needs. Lastly, the partners and staff of our member firms are able to communicate with each other through our website and view background information related to work experience.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: IGAF Polaris has been awarded TRUSTe’s Privacy Seal signifying that this privacy policy and practices have been reviewed by TRUSTe for compliance with TRUSTe's program requirements including transparency, accountability, and choice regarding the collection and use of your personal information.
